title: A wonderful place to eat!
review: Wonderful food. We had the burger and the rainbow bowl. Both were lovely, as were the brownie puddings. Can’t wait to come back to try more of the menu!
name: Lisa

title: Lovely lunch
review: This little place is in Neals Yard a little courtyard hidden away from the hurly burly - food was delicious we both had the bowls but had sneaky samosas and chips all vegan and very tasty! Highly recommend
name: Jeremy

title: Amazing Vegan Restaurant
review: Who knew you could find a vegan Sunday Roast? Well now I know. It was amazing. Great ambience and great food. Service was excellent as well. Definitely worth going while in Covent Garden.
name: Linda

title: Busy, buzzy vegan venue
review: We were two vegetarians and an omnivore enjoying the most delicious meals in this busy, bright and friendly cafe. Great menu, great ambience.
name: Jeff

title: Cute, cosy and tasty
review: This Redemption branch was very cute and cozy. The staff were really friendly. The food was great but nothing that left too much of an impression. Cocktails were hit and miss.
name: Mery

title: Lovely Vegan Pearl
review: Situated in “Neals’ Yard”, a slightly hidden square in central London you find this lovely restaurant. Friendly service, good innovative food and last but not least a charming location.
name: Paul

title: Fantastic food brilliant service
review: Superb vegan food, the best mushroom risotto I have ever had. All the food was excellent and the friendly service was the best.We will be back soon.
name: Sara
